title: What does your work space look like? Old Thread
content:
Looking for the old thread showing all who wished to post a pic of their work space. Does anyone remember where it may be located? Was it on the former site?  
Thanks,  
Chicky

 [‹ Type Battle: Pumpkin Carving](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208225850/http:/www.typophile.com/battle19 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dancing Letterforms ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208225850/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38713 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chicky

comments.content: I don’t know if I’ve seen that on Typophile, but Lifehacker ran a “coolest workspace” contest a while back: [http://lifehacker.com/software/coolest-workspace-contest/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208225850/http:/lifehacker.com/software/coolest-workspace-contest/ "http://lifehacker.com/software/coolest-workspace-contest/")

Thanks Miss Tiffany! I hoot when I read Grant’s stuff :)  
-c
